title: I love Bountiful!
comment: I love Bountiful Foods smoothies! I drink them every morning, and I was so surprised how great they make me feel!

title: Breakfast Smoothie
comment: Tasted great, highly recommended. Tried the sample pack first and will now more than likely be purchasing a full bag with my next order.

title: Great start!
comment: I actually really like the taste of these when mixed with milk. I blend it with milk and extra fruit plus lots of ice as they taste better colder!

title: Accessible
comment: As someone that is conscious of health, including my carb intake, I love the StrawberrySunrise and TropicalOatmeal!

title: Perfect solution
comment: I really like the GreenBowl and the BerryLicious.  What is more important is that my grandson liked it.

title: Highly recommend
comment: This is the 3rd time I have used Bountiful Drinks for our company Holiday Party. Once again they were outstanding.

title: Birthday party
comment: We used them for a 40th birthday party and it was great. I highly recommend them.

title: Very refreshing
comment: Tastes really good, very refreshing. I definitely will recommend it to family and friends! Very nicely made!

title: My favorites
comment: I tried the StrawberrySunrise for the first time and it,s delicious. Adding these drinks to my list of favorites!
